meanings.definition: A substance produced by the oxidation of natural rubber.
meanings.sent1: The factice was created from rubber oxidation.
meanings.sent2: The factory used factice to make rubber products.
meanings.sent3: The factice decided to throw a party for all the rubber compounds.
meanings.sent4: The factice of the situation was clear once the rubber started to harden.
meanings.sent5: The factice smelled like burnt rubber and chemicals.

meanings.definition: An artificial substance resembling natural rubber.
meanings.sent1: The factice looked like real rubber but was man-made.
meanings.sent2: The factice was used in place of natural rubber in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The factice surprised everyone with its rubber-like properties.
meanings.sent4: The factice was a rubber imitator, fooling many at first glance.
meanings.sent5: The factice felt smooth and bouncy, just like natural rubber.
